author: cnbc.com
title: Global Medical REIT Inc. Schedules 2017 Fourth Quarter and Year-End Financial Results Conference Call
text:
Conference Call Scheduled for Thursday, March 8, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. ET
BETHESDA, Md.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Global Medical REIT Inc. (NYSE:GMRE) (the “Company”), a Maryland corporation engaged primarily in the acquisition of licensed, state-of-the-art, purpose-built healthcare facilities and the leasing of these facilities to strong clinical operators with leading market share, announced today that it intends to release its financial results for its fourth quarter and 2017, after the market closes on Wednesday, March 7, 2018. The Company intends to hold a conference call to discuss those results the following day, March 8, 2018, at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time.
Conference Call Details
Date: Thursday, March 8, 2018 Time: 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time Participant Dial-In Numbers: Domestic callers: 877-407-3948 International callers: 201-389-0865 Access by Webcast
The call will also be simultaneously webcast over the Internet via the “Investor” section of the Company’s website at www.globalmedicalreit.com or by clicking on the conference call link: http://globalmedicalreit.equisolvewebcast.com/q4-2017 . An audio replay of the call will be archived on the Company’s website.
About Global Medical REIT Inc.
Global Medical REIT Inc. is a Maryland corporation engaged primarily in the acquisition of licensed, state-of-the-art, purpose-built healthcare facilities and the leasing of these facilities to strong clinical operators with leading market share. The Company elected to be taxed as a REIT for U.S. federal income tax purposes commencing with its taxable 2016.
